doc.title: Monterey Shore Diving
doc.plot: Monterey Shore Diving is video all about SCUBA diving along the beautiful coat of Monterey California. This program features: fourteen of Monterey's most popular shore diving sites, four well attended annual diving events, a look at the Monterey Bay Marine Sanctuary, diver support services, boat diving, non-diving activities, and much much more. Segments are hosted by local diving experts well experienced in the waters off of Monterey; with aerial, land, map, diagram, and underwater perspectives. If you are and experienced diver, thinking about becoming a diver, or if you're an ocean lover desiring to get a feel for Monterey's unique marine biodiversity, then you should look for the very informative and beautiful program: Monterey Shore Diving.
